title: Looks like Bauhaus, but not the same...
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317192704im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ShowUsWhatYouGot-square_3526.jpeg)

Can you guys please tell me the name of this font (the one that says SHOW US WHAT YOU GOT)? I believe it's a pretty common font. It looks like Bauhaus, but not exactly the same.

Thanks :)
